# 1 
Plot 4 graphs with LM, LR, SM, SR with slopes and geom_point()

```{r}
library(patchwork)
L_data <- subset(data, Size == "L")
S_data <- subset(data, Size == "S")
LM <- subset(L_data, Status == "M")
LR <- subset(L_data, Status == "R")
SM <- subset(S_data, Status == "M")
SR <- subset(S_data, Status == "R")

p1 <- ggplot(LM) + geom_point(aes(Time, Pairs)) + ggtitle("LM") + xlab("Time in thousands [Y]") + ylab("Nr. of Pairs") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
p2 <- ggplot(LR) + geom_point(aes(Time, Pairs)) + ggtitle("LR") + xlab("Time in thousands [Y]") + ylab("Nr. of Pairs") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
p3 <- ggplot(SM) + geom_point(aes(Time, Pairs)) + ggtitle("SM") + xlab("Time in thousands [Y]") + ylab("Nr. of Pairs") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
p4 <- ggplot(SR) + geom_point(aes(Time, Pairs)) + ggtitle("SR") + xlab("Time in thousands [Y]") + ylab("Nr. of Pairs") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))

p1 + p2 + p3 + p4

```
